quotes.message: Getting knocked down in life is a given. Getting up and moving forward is a choice.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: What is coming is better than what is gone. Let this belief aim you in the direction you need to go.
quotes.name: Karen Salmanson

quotes.message: Just doing nothing and having those still moments is what really rejuvenates the body.
quotes.name: Miranda Kerr

quotes.message: A woman who lives with the stress of an overwhelmed schedule will often ache with the sadness of an underwhelmed soul.
quotes.name: Lysa Terkeurst

quotes.message: If we don't see a failure as a challenge to modify our approach, but rather as a problem with ourselves, as a personality defect, we will immediately feel overwhelmed.
quotes.name: Anthony Robbins

quotes.message: It is nice finding that place where you can just go and relax.
quotes.name: Moises Arias

quotes.message: When you're overwhelmed by your emotion, you listen less and you judge more. This is also the reality of the dogmatic mind.
quotes.name: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.message: We don't realize that, somewhere within us all, there does exist a supreme self who is eternally at peace.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.message: Even from a dark night, songs of beauty can be born.
quotes.name: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.message: Life can be magnificent and overwhelming, that is the whole tragedy. Without beauty, love, or danger it would almost be easy to live.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: When life gets hectic and you feel overwhelmed, take a moment to focus on the people and things you are most grateful for. When you have an attitude of gratitude, frustrating troubles will fall by the wayside.
quotes.name: Dana Arcuri

quotes.message: When you do nothing, you feel overwhelmed and powerless. But when you get involved, you feel the sense of hope and accomplishment that comes from knowing you are working to make things better.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: We should all relax about life because you don't have a clue as to what's really going on.
quotes.name: Barry Sonnenfeld

quotes.message: If you don't do anything, you simply end up overwhelmed by something happening.
quotes.name: Matsuri Hino

quotes.message: The benefit of carrying the entire world on your shoulders was that you didn't have to stare it in the face.
quotes.name: Rhian J. Martin

quotes.message: The individual has always had to struggle to keep from being overwhelmed by the tribe. To be your own man is a hard business. If you try it, you will be lonely often, and sometimes frightened. But no price is too high to pay for the privilege of owning yourself.
quotes.name: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.message: Don't give up now. Chances are your best kiss, your hardest laugh, and your greatest day are still yet to come.
quotes.name: Atticus

quotes.message: Life has many ways of testing a person's will, either by having nothing happen at all or by having everything happen at once.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: Sometimes you're overwhelmed when a thing comes, and you do not realize the magnitude of the affair at that moment. When you get away from it, you wonder, did it really happen to you.
quotes.name: Marian Anderson

quotes.message: One must not let oneself be overwhelmed by sadness.
quotes.name: Jackie Kennedy

quotes.message: The feeling of overwhelm always means the same thing: You're too heavy on the action and not heavy enough on the alignment of energy.
quotes.name: Abraham Hicks

quotes.message: The individual has always had to struggle to keep from being overwhelmed by the tribe. If you try it, you will be lonely often, and sometimes frightened. But no price is too high to pay for the privilege of owning yourself.
quotes.name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.message: Sometimes when you're overwhelmed by a situation, when you're in the darkest of darkness that's when your priorities are reordered.
quotes.name: Phoebe Snow

quotes.message: At some stages of your life you will deal with things and at others you are overwhelmed with misery and anxiety.
quotes.name: Nigella Lawson

quotes.message: If you're overwhelmed, lost, or like you life is out of control, do whatever you can that matters to someone else or ever did to you... it might not help, but it certainly won't hurt.
quotes.name: Ingrid Weir

quotes.message: Learning to ignore things is one of the great paths to inner peace.
quotes.name: Robert J. Sawyer

quotes.message: Anxiety happens when you think you have to figure out everything all at once. Breathe. You're strong. You got this. Take it day by day.
quotes.name: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.message: Every day we have plenty of opportunities to get angry, stressed or offended. But what you're doing when you indulge these negative emotions is giving something outside yourself power over your happiness. You can choose to not let little things upset you.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Sometimes being overwhelmed by emotions can leave you speechless but even then it is important to identify the correct emotion.
quotes.name: Sam Owen

quotes.message: In most cases, you might just be overwhelmed by way too much sensory indoor distraught by taking in the emotions of others.
quotes.name: Vayana Ariz

quotes.message: The person who hates you is surely overwhelmed by not just one delusion but many.
quotes.name: Josh Bartok

quotes.message: Friends had told me in breathy tones that the moment my son appeared, I'd gaze into his little unblinking eyes and feel an overwhelming, boundless love, beyond anything I'd ever experienced in my life.
quotes.name: Kristin Van Ogtrop

quotes.message: Willingly taking on suffering, we will never be overwhelmed by the suffering that we are bound to experience.
quotes.name: Yangsi Rinpoche

quotes.message: The moment you think only of yourself, the focus of your whole reality narrows, and because of this narrow focus, uncomfortable things can appear huge and bring you fear and discomfort and a sense of feeling overwhelmed by misery.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: Change begins with a decision: to be overwhelmed or to overcome.
quotes.name: Perry Noble

quotes.message: What gets our attention ultimately determines our direction. If we are constantly focused on our circumstances, we will be overwhelmed.
quotes.name: Perry Noble

quotes.message: If you continue to identify yourself by your circumstances rather than by Christ in you, then you will always feel overwhelmed and trapped.
quotes.name: Perry Noble

quotes.message: As long as we identify ourselves by who we used to be, we fall back into that cycle of sin and become overwhelmed with guilt and shame.
quotes.name: Perry Noble

quotes.message: Don't allow the fear to overpower you, allow love to overpower you.
quotes.name: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.message: A mediator can sit joyously alone for months, for years.
quotes.name: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.message: The role you undertook to play . does not strike anyone. . It itself is struck powerfully . by the irresistible aspiration of the Dialectic . to overwhelm the Human Being . with second opinions . in a second head.
quotes.name: Ilias Foukis

quotes.message: I couldn't take it back to her shadow; that same unbearably pugnacious shadow; which had so torturously broken it in the first place; trying to lambaste and invidiously overwhelm every shade of my celestial existence,
quotes.name: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.message: And from the realms . Of the shadowy elms . A tide-like darkness overwhelm . The fields that round us lie. . But the night is fair, . And everywhere . A warm, soft vapor fills the air, . And distant sounds seem near.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: You can't calm the storm, so stop trying. What you can do is calm yourself. The storm will pass.
quotes.name: Timber Hawkeye

quotes.message: When my heart is overwhelmed, lead me to the rock that is higher than I.
quotes.name: Psalm 61:2

quotes.message: I feel so much that it is hard for me at times to feel anything at all.
quotes.name: Mary Kate Teske

quotes.message: I have been driven many times to my knees by the overwhelming conviction that I had absolutely no other place to go.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Some days you will feel like the ocean. Some days you will feel like you are drowning in it.
quotes.name: Lora Mathis

quotes.message: I often think I can't do this anymore but then I realize what choice do I have?
quotes.name: Justin Blaney

quotes.message: He was swimming in a sea of other people’s expectations. Men had drowned in seas like that.
quotes.name: Robert Jordan

quotes.message: I could no longer discern what was real and what was fake. Everything, including the present, seemed to be both too much and nothing at all.
quotes.name: Clemantine Wamariya

quotes.message: What’s on your mind? I don’t know. Nothing but everything at once.
quotes.name: Lidia Longorio

quotes.message: Your past haunts you . Your present overwhelms you . Your future scares you . Yet you survive.
quotes.name: Lidia Longorio

quotes.message: I had a dream that I was being drowned in a flood and I realized it was a flood of people.
quotes.name: Ellen Burstyn

quotes.message: People are being overwhelmed with social issues, political problems and economic problems - and this notion of giving everything up and going to live off-grid and to have a simpler way of life is quite attractive.
quotes.name: Ben Fogle

quotes.message: Our greatest battles are with our minds.
quotes.name: Jameson Frank

quotes.message: So many of us live in our own palace of pain, convinced that we are alone in our struggle, but the fact is… we're not alone.
quotes.name: Lisa Lieberman-Wang
